pages.text: Brass spikes steal the cognitive feruchemical powers: $(p)Feruchemically storing and tapping $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_zinc)Zinc$(), $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_brass)Brass$(), $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_copper)Copper$() and $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_bronze)Bronze$(), the feruchemical attributes keyed to each of these are:  $(p)Mental Speed(XP Gain Rate), Warmth(Fire Resistance/Fire Aspect), Memories(Current XP), and Wakefulness(Phantom Spawn Timer). $(p)
